data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Tlaxcala unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tlaxcala, Mexico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Tlaxcala.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 183 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Tlaxcala, Mexico.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tlaxcala, Mexico who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Tlaxcala, Mexico.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Huichol people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Tlaxcala, Mexico to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tlaxcala, Mexico to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Tlaxcala, Mexico will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
